Class InvasionTheatreController

java.lang.Object
controller.invasiontheatre.InvasionTheatreController
public class InvasionTheatreController extends Object
The controller class for the InvasionTheater object. It is used as the main board of the game and the controller will be sort of the main axis between the programm and the operator. It can execute the main functions of the simulation as such as: - Start the simulation - Send the simulation state to the view to be shown - Listen to the operator's inputs to make the simulation go on.
